name: RagnaLoardmon
effect: ＜Security Attack +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)＜Reboot＞ (Unsuspend this Digimon during your opponent's unsuspend phase.)[When Digivolving] You may place 1 [Durandamon] or [BryweLudramon] from your hand on top of this card's digivolution cards to gain 3 memory.
